emailPage.whatIsEmail: WELSH - What is the registered email address for the partnership?
emailPage.emailHint: WELSH - Partners must be able to access emails that are sent to this address.

emailUsedFor.title: WELSH - What is the registered email address used for?
emailUsedFor.sendInformation: WELSH - In future we'll use this to send important information that relates to the limited partnership. For example, new legislative requirements or warnings about missed deadlines.
emailUsedFor.publicRegister: WELSH - It will not be shown on the public register.

namePage.title: WELSH - Limited partnership name
namePage.whatIsName: WELSH - What is the limited partnership name?
namePage.whatIsNameHint: WELSH - Do not enter a name ending, like Limited Partnership or LP. We'll add this for you.
namePage.checkName: WELSH - Check the limited partnership name against an existing trademark
namePage.checkNameExistingLP: WELSH - You must check the name is not the same as an existing limited partnership on the Companies House register (link opens in a new tab). If it is, we will reject your application.
namePage.checkNameExistingTrademark: WELSH - You should also use the trade mark search (link opens in a new tab) to check if your name matches an existing trade mark. If it does, consider choosing a different name. Companies House will not carry out this check for you.
namePage.nameEnding: WELSH - Which limited partnership name ending would you prefer to go on the public record?
namePage.nameEndingHint: WELSH - There's no difference between the name endings Limited Partnership, LP and L.P. except for how they look.
namePage.existingPartnershipHint: WELSH - You must check the name is not the same as an existing partnership or company on the Companies House register (opens in a new tab). If it is, we’ll reject your application.
namePage.sensitiveWordHint: WELSH - If the name includes sensitive words or expressions that require approval (opens in a new tab), you must get permission before you register.
namePage.existingTrademarkHint: WELSH - You should also use the trade mark search (opens in a new tab) to check if your name matches an existing trade mark. If it does, consider choosing a different name. Companies House will not carry out this check for you.

privateNamePage.existingTrademarkHint: WELSH - Use the trade mark search (link opens in a new tab) to check if your name matches an existing trade mark. If it does, consider choosing a different name. Companies House will not carry out this check for you.
privateNamePage.nameEnding: WELSH - Which private fund limited partnership name ending would you prefer to go on the public record?

generalPartnersPage.title: WELSH - You now need to tell us about the general partners
generalPartnersPage.pageInformation: WELSH - If the partnership has more than one general partner, you'll add them one at a time.

pageNotFound.title: WELSH - Page Not Found
pageNotFound.spelling: WELSH - If you typed the web address, check it is spelled correctly.
pageNotFound.copiedAddress: WELSH - If you pasted the web address, check you copied the entire address.
pageNotFound.movedPage: WELSH - If the web address is correct or you selected a link, the page may have moved.
pageNotFound.goToStartPage: WELSH - To register a limited partnership, go to the Register a limited partnership start page.

errorPage.title: WELSH - Sorry, the service is unavailable
errorPage.tryLater: WELSH - You will be able to use the service at a later date.
errorPage.moreInfo: WELSH - Email enquiries@companieshouse.gov.uk, if you need more information.
